text:
I had skin surgery at Renaissance Dermatology Specialist Clinic recently and I'm truly impressed by their exceptional service.

The whole team, led by Dr Hanif, was friendly and approachable. They ensured that I was well-informed and comfortable throughout the entire surgery.

Dr Hanif stood out particularly for his warm demeanour and he made me completely at ease. It's evident that patient care is their top priority. Highly recommend!

Dr Hanif was very helpful in identifying the skin issues that I had experienced and provided reassuring guidance on how to treat the problems.

The consultation rates and costs of medications were comparable to other private specialist clinics. I would be very happy to recommend him to anyone looking for a dermatologist.

Dr Noor Hanif is attentive, knowledgeable and caring. He listens to his patients and provides treatment accordingly. I have visited three doctors prior, but no relief.  I am delighted with Dr Noor Hanifâ€™s effective treatment plan. The specialist consultation and treatment cost is reasonable as I could see impressive results on my skin in 3 days after almost three weeks of suffering from eczema and urticaria.

Had a cyst removed by Dr Hanif. Since it was covered under my company insurance, every step was smooth and easy. Had lengthy conversation while doctor was performing the surgery process to relieve my fear as well. Appreciative that the doctor could keep up with the conversations even during the surgery!

My first time at Renaissance Dermatology Specialist Clinic and I was very impressed!

The treatment options were clearly explained by the dermatologist, Dr Hanif, and the procedure was professionally carried out. The charges are comparable to other private dermatology clinics.

I am very satisfied with the result of the procedure so l would definitely recommend this clinic!
